attributes.action: Members of parliament to be paid average UK salary.
attributes.additional_details:
This money is surely better invested in other parts of the government such as the NHS and public services. I believe if members of parliament earn the average UK wage then changes will be made. 

Some members of parliament donate some of their wages to charity.
attributes.background: Members of parliament should receive a normal living wage. We understand the responsibility and importance of the role of an MP but on average the  members of parliament earn £77k plus bonus around £15.5k

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
